spec_data.Name: xerces-c-devel
spec_data.Description:
This package contains the header files, static libraries and development
documentation for xerces-c. If you like to develop programs using xerces-c,
you will need to install xerces-c-devel.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 12:26:32 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Header files, libraries and development documentation for xerces-c
